scripts.prepush: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.push: make(){ if [[ -z "$1" ]]; then echo Commit message should not be empty. ;exit 1; fi; npm run prepush && git add . && git commit -m "$1" && git push; }; make
scripts.test: npm run build && node --stack-size=5000 -r ts-node/register tests/index.ts
